demo.Zhihao.Client

Class PrivateConv

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • demo.Zhihao.Client.PrivateConv
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class PrivateConv
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is the main class for direct connection(using UDP) between 2 clients.
    This class enables the clients to interact without the interfere of server.
    This is the model part of the Private Conversation module.
    Author:
    ben

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrivateConv

        public PrivateConv(java.lang.String otherClient)
        Creates a Private Conversation instance.
        Instance created using this constructor is the client sending the request.
        Parameters:
        otherClient - the name of the other client.

      • PrivateConv

        public PrivateConv(java.lang.String otherClient,
           java.lang.String ip,
           int port)
        Creates a Private Conversation instance.
        The instance created using this constructor is the client who answers the request.
        Parameters:
        otherClient - the name of the other client.
        ip - the IP address of the other client.localhost should be 127.0.0.1 instead of 0.0.0.0
        port - the port number of the client.
